ISSUE.TITLE: Branch based deploys
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It would be nice to be able to have different deploy options based on git branch. I would imagine the drone.yml would look something like this: ``` deploy: staging: heroku: app: safe-island-6261-staging master: heroku: app: safe-island-6261-staging ``` We generally don't deploy our development branch (used for local testing only), but deploy both our staging and master branches.
